title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
Hello, i have an 820-3330-B with non functional USB ports. 

 PP5V_S3_USB_A_F and  PP5V_S3_USB_B_F are 5.05v each and the board appears perfectly fine.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
Not working USB 2 and 3 modes?
Check the series coils from data lines.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
I plugged an old mouse and it works on both ports , so im guessing  USB_EXTA_MUXED_F_N  and  USB_EXTA_MUXED_F_P lines are good?

L4700 and L4600 have no signs of damage. I dont know howto measure them to see if they are good. On diode mode they give me similar values to that of a working motherboard.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
So you have problems only with USB 3.0 mode.

Check L4710/20 and C4720/21 integrity.
USB ports connect with PCH.
Clean the contacts and check diode mode to ground at RX/TX data lines.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
L4710/20 and C4720/21 all look fine. 

Diode Mode:

Port A

USB3_EXTA_RX_F_N:     0.298

USB3_EXTA_RX_F_P:      0.298

USB3_EXTA_TX_F_N:      0.695

USB3_EXTA_TX_F_P:       0.695

Port B

USB3_EXTB_RX_F_N:     0.293

USB3_EXTB_RX_F_P:      0.296

USB3_EXTB_TX_F_N:      0.695

USB3_EXTB_TX_F_P:       0.695

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message: Did you test with USB 3.0 pendrive?

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message: Yes i did, used 3 different USB drives

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message: Check diode mode on the PCH side of the series caps.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
SPI_CS0_R_L:  0.459

SPI_CLK_R: 0.466

SPI_MOSI_R: 0.891

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
USB and SPI is not the same thing!

I was talking about something like C4720/21.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
Oh, sorry

USB3_EXTA_TX_N:     0.276

USB3_EXTA_TX_P:      0.278

USB3_EXTB_TX_N:     0.274

USB3_EXTB_TX_P:      0.273

Measured on C4620/1 and C4720/21 PCH side.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
Disconnect RIO board and test only onboard left USB port.
Also try another macOS instalation.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message: Its a 2012 15'' macbook pro model

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
Sorry, I was thinking to 3332 board.

Remove D4610/710, just in case.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message: You mean only remove or replace?

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message: Just remove the protection diodes, for test.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message: Lmao... it recognizes USB 3.0 on both ports now. Thank god it wasnt the fucking PCH. Thanks a lot man, have a great day

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
Replaced   D4610 and D4710 with working ones from donor board. USBs working great. 

Thank you.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message: You're welcome!

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
Hi, sorry to open this thread again. 

I having issues with this computer again, the USB ports are not working with USB 2.0, only 3.0 works. Also the SD Card reader is not working.

What should i be looking for ?

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
Check USB 2.0 data lines; pay atention to series coils and diode protection to ground.
Compare diode mode readings with good board.

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
Visually the line looks great.

Diode redings:

                                                Bad Board:                          Good Board:

USB_EXTA_MUXED_F_N :    0.495                                    0.484

USB_EXTA_MUXED_F_P:      0.0                                        0.478

USB_EXTB_F_N:                    0.448                                    0.438

USB_EXTB_F_P:                    0.0                                         0.4.38

title: 820-3330-B no USB ports
message:
Replaced both diodes and  also had to replaced L4600/700 now the ports are working all right.

Thank you very much.
